title: We recently redesigned our free daily and weekly opinion summaries newsletters!
description: Current subscribers will notice that the newsletters have a cleaner, more modern feel, while still providing the same free opinion summaries as before.
extra: Justia Opinion Summaries is a completely free service. We have 68 different daily newsletters for each of the federal appellate courts and highest state courts and weekly newsletters covering 63 practice areas. Sign up at daily.justia.com
